meanings: Noun 리얼 TV (배우가 아닌 사람들의 실생활을 담은 TV 오락 프로)

meanings.meaning: Rhymes Equal Actual Life in the Youth
Real Experiences Altering Lives In Today's Youth
Real Experience Appropriate Learning In Teenage Years

vlive.korean: [체념] - 장난 친 겁니다 - 빙고판 갖고 와! [Accept the reality] - We were kidding. - Bring me the Bingo board. 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : TO DO X TOMORROW X TOGETHER 2020 - EP.7
vlive.english: [Accept the reality] - We were kidding. - Bring me the Bingo board.

vlive.korean: [현실을 부정해보지만 떨리는 목소리 벌칙 쪽지 너... 고맙...] [His voice is shaking denying the reality. Thank you, the penalty note...] View video V PICK! : [PARK JI HOON] 크레이지 방귀케이드 왕초보뉴비먕먕,, 내 물풍선에 저장😉💦 (JI HOON playing the game with MAY)
vlive.english: [His voice is shaking denying the reality. Thank you, the penalty note...]

vlive.korean: [현실 부정]- 연습 판이었잖아요... - 그렇죠, 딱 정해주세요, 이제부터라고! [Denying the reality] - It was a practice round. - Please tell us it starts now. 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : TO DO X TOMORROW X TOGETHER 2020 - EP.7
vlive.english: [Denying the reality] - It was a practice round. - Please tell us it starts now.

vlive.korean: [현실 직시] - 지금 4문제밖에 못 맞혔거든요? - 아메리카노? [Cold reality] - We answered only 4 questions. - Americano? 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : TO DO X TOMORROW X TOGETHER 2020 - EP.6
vlive.english: [Cold reality] - We answered only 4 questions. - Americano?

vlive.korean: 'reality in BLACK' 앨범 전곡이 공개됐잖아요 - 네~ our full album "reality in BLACK" has been released. - Yes. 듣기 View video MAMAMOO : [Replay] MAMAMOO [reality in BLACK] FAN SHOWCASE
vlive.english: our full album "reality in BLACK" has been released. - Yes.

examples.korean: She refuses to face reality. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀는 현실을 직시하기를 거부한다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She refuses to face reality. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: You’re out of touch with reality. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 당신은 현실과 동떨어져 있어요. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: You’re out of touch with reality. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Will time travel ever become a reality? 듣기 Add to Wordbook 시간 여행이 과연 현실이 될 것인가? Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Will time travel ever become a reality? Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: His theories are somewhat remote from reality. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그의 이론은 현실과 약간 동떨어져 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: His theories are somewhat remote from reality. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: He seems completely divorced from reality. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 현실과 완전히 단절되어 있는 것 같이 보인다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He seems completely divorced from reality. Add to Wordbook
